In England, in the seven days to 29 July, there were 65,125 new confirmed cases (115.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 July, there were 99,165 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 34% (34,040 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 August is 19,699,384 (34,835.3 cases per 100,000 population).
